house_listing.house_description: This is home! 3bedroom 1.5 bath, freshly painted, new roof dec98, large fenced backyard with mature fruit trees. Location convenient to shopping, expressway, etc. All closing paid on fpc. Detached shed w/electricity. Warranty. Pull down stairs to storage in attic.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Storage Space, Walk-InCloset(s)
